text: Many legacy BI tools
that are used to generate business critical reports
require high upfront costs, ongoing maintenance,
specialized training, and they operate in an environment
separated from dashboarding,
which causes a disjointed experience.
Amazon QuickSight Paginated Reports
unifies these systems,
allowing you to create, schedule and share
highly formatted multi-page reports in a single,
fully managed BI solution based in the cloud.
Start building reports quickly
without extensive training,
using QuickSight's easy-to-use web interface.
Develop reports with specific paper size and orientation,
custom headers and footers, and tailor page breaks,
margins, and padding.
You can then easily share these documents
with your end users at scale
to better enable data-driven decision making.
QuickSight's serverless architecture
enables you to share your reports
with hundreds of thousands of end users
while reducing costs.
End users get a unified experience,
with one place to access all
of their dashboards and reports.
Make the most of your data today
with Amazon QuickSight Paginated Reports.
